title: Convenience and Affordability!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'x 10', 'OR Text', '10', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text us.', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 485 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Shaded by tall trees in a park-like setting, Parks at Treepoint provides a beautiful setting in a terrific location.', 'Tucked in the southwestern corner of Arlington, Parks at Treepoint is convenient to I-20, Downtown Arlington, Downtown Fort Worth, and Downtown Dallas.', 'Come see our renovated apartment homes and updated amenities!', 'This ideal Metroplex location puts you near it all - but still provides a quiet place to call home.', 'Features:', 'DR - Washer & Dryer*, Upgraded Hardware, Washer/Dryer Hookup*, Hardwood-Style Flooring*, Large Closets, Private Patio/Balcony, 2 Inch Blinds, Pool view*, Disposal*, Modern Interior Paint Finishes, Designer Lighting, New Kitchen Appliance Package', '*', 'In select units', 'Community Amenities:', 'Pool Area Lounge Seating, Package Receiving, New Convenient Online Payments, Lounge Areas, Fitness Studio, Online Maintenance Requests, Covered Parking, Outdoor Kitchen, Clubhouse, Leash- Free Dog Park, Courtyard', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Policy Type: Cat, Dog', 'Max Weight of Pets: 75', 'Pet Monthly Rent Max: $25', 'Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.', 'There is an $87.50 pet deposit (non-refundable) per pet and $300 pet fee per pet.', 'Pet rent is $25 per month.', 'There is a weight limit of 75 pounds per pet, aggressive breeds are prohibited (Akitas, Chows, Dobermans, German Shepards, Mastiffs, Pit Bulls, Rottweiler, Siverian Huskies and Wolf Hybrids or any mixes of these breeds.)', 'Picture of pets and proof vaccines must be provided.', 'Please call our Leasing Center for complete Pet Policy information.', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'VZLgi7Z8M']
